description:
Is your finger connected to your brain?  
 
From the makers of the popular puzzle game U Connect...comes Mr. Kumo! 
 
Who's Mr. Kumo you ask?  He's a confused and cute little spider who needs your help.  Who would of ever thought a spider would forget to how to make a web.  Well, Mr. Kumo has and he needs your help! 
 
Mr. Kumo is an addictive puzzle game which uses a simple concept that also makes you really think! 
If you love U Connect, you and your kids will absolutely go bonkers for Mr. Kumo!  It will have your kids playing for hours!  Heck, it may even have YOU playing for days or maybe even weeks!! 
 
GAME PLAY 
Help Mr. Kumo make his web by moving him from point-to-point to connect all the points without retracing his steps.  It's as simple as that but definitely trickier than it sounds...just ask Mr. Kumo! 
 
FEATURES 
400 brain teasing puzzles 
6 different achievements 
pick-up-n-play simplicity 
simple and super smooth game controls 
beautiful graphics, music and sound effects 
helpful hint system to help you if you are stuck 
thumbnails allow you to choose which puzzle you want to play or replay 
star rating system 
 
Official website: http://bitlogik.com 
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/bitlogik 
Follow us on twitter: http://www.twitter.com/bitlogik
